title: Print, "The Still Pool (Oyodo), No. 41", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: The Still Pool
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 41 / Oyodo.
description: A large iris in deep purple; inner leaves lighter in hue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Still Pool (Oyodo), No. 41", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.5 x 27.9 cm (15 15/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-93.
